deductPoint(address,uint8,uint8,uint8).details: Update points for the target user for the current phase if they are already initialized otherwise create a new spot for them.

params.creator: : Point earned as a pool creator

registerToEarnPoints().details: Register user to earn points for the current phase

params.creator: : Point earned as a pool creator

switchPhase().details: Move to the next phase. Only rolebearer function

points.details: Mapping showing users rewards for all phases

deductPoint(address,uint8,uint8,uint8).notice: Function will always use the current phase

registerToEarnPoints().notice: Users automatically earn free 5 points for signing up
